Class Polka

java.lang.Object

      org.deuce.transaction.tl2cm.cm.BackoffCM

All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentionManager
public class Polka
extends BackoffCM

The Polka contention manager combines the back-off capabilities of Polite and the priority-based resolution algorithm of Karma.

Since:
1.2
Author:
Yoav Cohen, yoav.cohen@cs.tau.ac.il

resolve

public ContentionManager.Action resolve(WriteFieldAccess contentionPoint,
                                        Context contending,
                                        Context other)
Description copied from interface: ContentionManager
Resolves the conflict between the two threads

Parameters:
contentionPoint - The resource the threads are contending on
contending - The thread that attempts to acquire the resource
other - The thread the holds the resource
Returns:
Action to perform by contending thread

requiresPriorities

public boolean requiresPriorities()
Description copied from interface: ContentionManager
Whether or not this contention manager requires the STM system to collect priorities for each thread

Specified by:

Overrides:

Returns:
